# thecloud_snapshot (Resource)

Snapshot resource allows you to manage point-in-time snapshots of volumes.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `volume_id` (String) The ID of the volume to back up.

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the snapshot.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the snapshot.
- `status` (String) The status of the snapshot.
